ComicInfo.Title: Shake Hands With Danger
ComicInfo.Summary: Fifty years from now, an elevated highway spans the nation. Initially a response to international terrorism, the US government grounds commercial airline flights and builds THE BLACK DIAMOND, a dangerous road full of gearheads and misfits, drug runners and grey-market tech heads, all driving illegal 1970s muscle cars in a nomadic, breakneck existence. But when the government decides to clean up THE BLACK DIAMOND heading east and when his wife is kidnapped to be used as a hostage by forces loyal to the road, Dr. Don McLaughlin, DDS, has to borrow his brother-in-law's illegal 1973 Mercury Cougar to get on the highway and rescue his wife... 150 feet above and 100 miles an hour faster than anything he's ever known.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 19:46:05. [CVDB111522]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Don McLaughlin, Jim Maddox, Katie McLaughlin
